thread.title: Kirk Norcross welcomes baby boy and shares name AND first picture of little son
thread.title_full: Kirk Norcross welcomes baby boy and shares name AND first picture of little son

author: Emmeline Saunders
title: Kirk Norcross welcomes baby boy and shares name AND first picture of little son
text:
Kirk Norcross welcomes baby boy and shares name AND first picture of little son The former TOWIE star has become a dad for the second time Share Kirk Norcross (Photo: Getty / Twitter / @kirk_official) Share   Thank you for subscribing!   
Kirk Norcross has become a dad for the second time after his girlfriend Danielle Carr gave birth to a baby boy. 
The former TOWIE star, 28, had been keeping his Twitter followers updated when Danielle went into labour in the early hours of this morning, even sharing a picture of him laying his head next to his girlfriend while she was lying in a hospital bed. 
And now their little boy has been born, and they've already decided on a name. 
"And he's here!!!! Harry Michael Norcross," Kirk tweeted along with a picture of himself cradling the newborn, whose curled hand and tiny ears can just about be seen peeking above a hospital blanket. 
Their friends and fans were quick to congratulate the new parents, with one tweeting: "Congratulations to you both!! Give Dan my love." 
Another said: "Awww loving his name! Congratulations to you and your other half!! Enjoy him." 
And a third wrote: "What a beautiful baby boy." 
However, not everyone was happy about the news. Kirk has become a dad for the second time (Photo: Getty) 
Kirk's ex-girlfriend Holli Willis, who is the mother of his other child, Violett, blasted the reality star for trying to "up his profile" with a picture of the baby. 
"So you plaster your daughters picture all over media to up your profile then hide your new born son face...." she tweeted just after Kirk announced his son's arrival. 
The exes have been warring for months, with Kirk claiming Holli is stopping him from seeing his daughter. 
The former TOWIE hunk recently revealed that lately he's been having trouble getting access to Violett, having shared some rare baby snaps of his little girl alongside a smattering of love-heart emojis. 
In the adorable snaps, Kirk can see seen holding tightly onto his daughter and sporting a huge grin. 
Taking to his Twitter account previously, the star revealed his family troubles when he shared pictures of his little girl alongside a heartbreaking caption. 
He wrote: “Miss my daughter so much!!!” alongside a sad face and a purple heart emoji. Kirk and Holli split before the birth of their child (Photo: Rex Features) 
It wasn't the first time he'd claimed he's been unable to see his daughter. 
Earlier in January, he wrote on Twitter that a mother should "never" stop a dad seeing their little girl. 
Kirk ranted: “Ha People commenting on stuff they no nothing about FYI a mum should never stop a dad see his daughter just because she got the Hump wid him [sic]”. 
It seems that Holli is angry about the news that Kirk is expecting a second child with another woman . He announced the news on Instagram (Photo: Instagram/kirk_norcross) 
Taking to Twitter, the angry mum told fans she only found out about the news a MONTH ago. 
She wrote: “So just had a bit of news via TEXT message couldn't even be man enough to tell me face to face! Your having another baby by some random! 
“Due in Feb! Couldn't even wait couple months after violett was born to start f***ing someone else”. 
“So good luck to whoever you are who is having his baby in February hope you wernt expecting much out of him![sic]," she added. 
Mirror Online has contacted Kirk for comment. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
